title: Electric field due to a shell of charge

content.question: Which of the following correctly ranks the electric field <math alttext="E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> at the five labeled points?

choices.label: <math alttext="E sub E is greater than E sub D, which is greater than E sub C, which is greater than E sub B, which is greater than E sub A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="E sub E is greater than E sub D, which is greater than E sub C, which is greater than, open parenthesis, E sub B equals E sub A, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, E sub C equals E sub D, which equals E sub E, close parenthesis, which is greater than, open parenthesis, E sub A equals E sub B, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, E sub A equals E sub B, close parenthesis, which is greater than, open parenthesis, E sub C equals E sub D, which equals E sub E, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, E sub B equals E sub A, close parenthesis, which is greater than E sub E, which is greater than E sub D, which is greater than E sub C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, E sub C equals E sub D, which equals E sub E, close parenthesis, which is greater than, open parenthesis, E sub A equals E sub B, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>C</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>></mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></msub></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 8: Electric Charges, Fields, and Gauss's Law

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
